TopicTitle: Where is all this new stuff coming from?

Articles.Content: Ok, i might just be the dumbest person alive, i checked all the dev posts and i cannot find anything about the new planets? can someone point me in the right direction?
Try the 0.17 discussion thread. Look about 40 pages back.

From here in the Development section:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/15757-KSP-0-17-Update

Or do you mean the images? Nova's Dev Album has a few. Just click on his profile to find it
